name: Patrick Guettner
statement:
**Elected Experience**  
An Elected PCO since 2006  
  
**Other Professional Experience**  
40 years of engineering/managerial involvement in the nuclear field  
  
**Education**  
B.S. in aerospace engineering; Juris Doctor in law

**Community Service**  
Key Man in US Jaycees; Scoutmaster; Squadron Commander-CAP; Chairman - Zoning Regional Commission; United Way Coordinator; Volunteer Fireman

**Statement**  
As a resident of the Tri-cities for 20 years, I humbly submit my candidacy for the office of State Legislator, LD 8, Position 1.  I run to be an effective voice for you in Legislature.
